title: I have suggested that oracles were key aspects of Moche huacas
Tanta Carhua’s story is told at greater length in Silverblatt

It is generally thought that the plague was a European disease, probably smallpox, which preceded the physical arrival of the Spanish, but we know very little about autochthonous diseases in ancient America
suggest that it was Bartonellosis, a fatal bacterial disease that is found exclusively in the New World
Dean 1999 for Cañaris and Corpus Christi in Cusco
